message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of transmitting correlated vector Gaussian sources over a broadcast channel, which is a classic problem in information theory and falls under the purview of cs.IT (Information Theory). The paper also discusses the issue of reconstruction distortion, which is a topic of interest in cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.SI (Signal Processing), and cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also introduces a new bounding technique, which could be of interest to researchers in cs.LG (Machine Learning).
